metadata.title: python-cryptography: Bleichenbacher timing oracle attack against RSA decryption - incomplete fix for CVE-2020-25659 (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the python-cryptography package. This issue may allow a remote attacker to decrypt captured messages in TLS servers that use RSA key exchanges, which may lead to exposure of confidential or sensitive data. 
            STATEMENT: This vulnerability exists due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-25659.
            MITIGATION: Mitigation for this issue is either not available or the currently available options do not meet the Red Hat Product Security criteria comprising ease of use and deployment, applicability to widespread installation base or stability.

criterions.comment: python3-cryptography is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
python-cryptography is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
